title: Do you think Riot will apply the lesson on the next rework?
body: By the lesson I mean stop releasing overtuned shit just "to make sure."

replies.body: If you are talking about Warwick he is for damn sure not over tuned. Losing extra movespeed while in combat makes him kitable as fuck.

> [{quoted}](name=Ad Vitam Aeterna,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h8ctRMEW,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-27T03:07:17.501+0000)
>
> If you are talking about Warwick he is for damn sure not over tuned. Losing extra movespeed while in combat makes him kitable as fuck.

Yeah you've clearly yet to experience him ulting you under tower and not dying plus him having that DR is fucking nuts. Also he gets an AS buff globally which means that when I poke someone low he can clear all his camps faster no matter where he is without even showing up in the lane. I kid you not

That isn't how it works, jesus christ. Play the champ before commenting on it, you only get extra AS when you attack something under 50 percent health. That includes jungle camps that go below 50 percent health. I've been spamming him on 2 smurf accounts and have a combined 14 games on him.

I understand you've been hard stuck in silver for 3 seasons so you aren't really bright enough to understand counterplay to certain things, but at least play the champ before making a thread on him, otherwise you say the dumb shit you just did about him getting the AS buff when anything on the map is under 50 percent health.

> [{quoted}](name=Ad Vitam Aeterna,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h8ctRMEW,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2017-01-27T13:03:53.443+0000)
>
> That isn't how it works, jesus christ. Play the champ before commenting on it, you only get extra AS when you attack something under 50 percent health. That includes jungle camps that go below 50 percent health. I've been spamming him on 2 smurf accounts and have a combined 14 games on him.
> 
> I understand you've been hard stuck in silver for 3 seasons so you aren't really bright enough to understand counterplay to certain things, but at least play the champ before making a thread on him, otherwise you say the dumb shit you just did about him getting the AS buff when anything on the map is under 50 percent health.


Bringing up rank and ad hom because you're not capable of just saying the other stuff? How old are you again? For the record I've played less than 400 ranked games between seasons 5 and 6 combined so you should probably factor that in if you're going to bring my rank up. You know, because thats a huge sign I don't play a lot of ranked. Some of us actually have full time jobs and social lives. Also, his damage reduction of 55% is still pretty absurd. I have no problem being wrong but you should have a problem being a poor excuse of a person. And again, like I said the person playing him claimed he was getting the AS buff. So I'm not spouting dumb shit baselessly. I have no problem with that not being a flaw but the ease of getting a sub one minute ult etc is still pretty fucking dumb
Let's not pretend you're good and bring rank into when you were boosted into plat. PSA: plat is still low elo.

Plat 5  is the top 7 percent of the game, which isn't that low. If I was boosted how did I make it there two years in a row, last year and this year? That large losing streak I have is mostly intentional, I knew I was going to be banned on that account (which I am now) for flaming so I started trolling most matches by afk farming the jung until it ended. 

It's always silver or bronze players that love to talk about the state of balance of certain champs while spouting blatantly incorrect things.
Yeah, suuuure it was intentional. Baddie. OP is wrong, but not for being silver lol.

Another one making claims without actually doing research first. If you check my replays on replay.gg you'll see I go and afk farm the jung in half those games until it's over.

You silvers are always spouting bullshit.
I totally believe ya bud! Really I do!

He doesn't get attack speed just when someone is low. He only gets attack speed when attacking someone that's low. 

I've tested it by switching my intended targets with grouped jungle monsters like raptors, krugs, and wolves. His attack speed only increases when targeting a low health target.

> [{quoted}](name=C9 Feel The Bern,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h8ctRMEW,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-01-27T05:58:45.599+0000)
>
> Yeah you've clearly yet to experience him ulting you under tower and not dying plus him having that DR is fucking nuts. Also he gets an AS buff globally which means that when I poke someone low he can clear all his camps faster no matter where he is without even showing up in the lane. I kid you not

thats not how his attack speed works he actually has to hit that low target it isnt free

> [{quoted}](name=TheScrubUDeserve,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h8ctRMEW,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-01-27T06:21:35.914+0000)
>
> thats not how his attack speed works he actually has to hit that low target it isnt free

I was literally in a skype call with someone who was gettign the AS buff no where near the target. That means either one, it is bugged and giving him more power than it should, or two they fucked up with the coding and it is doing something it isn't supposed to. Or at the very least for the person I was playing with plus the people I'm playing against. AS bonus perspective even the Warwick players I play against think he is overtuned

U realise he gets the attack buff targeting anything that's low 

like say a monster camp?

> [{quoted}](name=C9 Feel The Bern,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h8ctRMEW,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-27T06:31:28.808+0000)
>
> I was literally in a skype call with someone

Say no more I was in a skype call with a guy who said the sun revolves around the earth so it must be true which makes your claim equally true. Undeniably true! Why I dare say it is alternate false!

Your friend was most likely just hitting a low hp target while someone else on the map was low.

> [{quoted}](name=TheScrubUDeserve,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h8ctRMEW,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-27T06:40:04.418+0000)
>
> Say no more I was in a skype call with a guy who said the sun revolves around the earth so it must be true which makes your claim equally true. Undeniably true! Why I dare say it is alternate false!
> 
> Your friend was most likely just hitting a low hp target while someone else on the map was low.

I mean he was literally doing a camp but ok. Have you considered that just like with clients riot makes fuck ups?

Also just looked up your match history on this account and you've barely played with or against it recently which makes your opinon less valid due to lack of experience tbh. And the only game I see on your record with a WW they went deathless.
He can glitch and move baron. That's pretty op if you move it to your base.

Riot intentionally releases OP new champs and reworks because people buy them up by the droves to stay competitive. 

I prefer how things went with Bard's release. He was slightly under tuned and then they gave him small buffs until he was good.
Honestly I don't doubt he'll get nerfed. It'll probably be his max E DR since 55% on a basic ability is pretty powerful.
He'll feel overtuned because he is new and we need to know his counters. As for now i think kat rework was the most overtuned rework i have seen in a while.

> [{quoted}](name=sobi999,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h8ctRMEW,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-01-27T06:35:06.638+0000)
>
> He'll feel overtuned because he is new and we need to know his counters. As for now i think kat rework was the most overtuned rework i have seen in a while.

I legit feel they have yet to undertune a rework in I don't know how long. People swore Darius was undertuned but then he got hotfix buffed and then dropped right back to where he was at rework so I mean..
WW is overtuned?
No.
